resources.string: The next few screens will help you to set up the Emergency Recorder to make video recordings of your environment during emergency calls.
Emergency Recorder needs a few permissions in order to be able to detect your emergency call, to initiate the camera, and to store the video footage you record on your phone.
Emergency Recorder will never share any footage you take without your consent.
Emergency Recorder needs an extra permissions to be able to use your camera on screen in a bubble.
Emergency Recorder needs to run in the background to detect emergency calls. Please disable Battery Optimisation for Emergency Recorder.
The Emergency Recorder is now ready to record should you ever find yourself making an emergency call.
Please grant the requested permissions to allow this app to take and record video during emergency calls.
Please grant overlay permissions for this app.
Please disable battery optimisations for this app.
